content: If I know of students of informatics programs that are interested in reviewing IGs, is that useful - where do I direct them? How do they go about preparing to be a reviewer? @Lenel James @Grahame Grieve @Lloyd McKenzie

@Lloyd McKenzie @Grahame Grieve @Lenel James Did you record the trainings on IG review and quality? Do you have slide decks available. I have NY schools that might be interested and we have an outreach to Atlanta students on Wednesday afternoon
We did record the training and once the recordings are available, we'll place links to the videos and the presentations on a page and will broadcast that. I'll try to remember to broadcast here too.
